Rulings.Tengu:
●The effect that destroys all other monsters will activate even if “Red Dragon Archfiend/Assault Mode” is destroyed by battle.
●You cannot Special Summon a Synchro Monster that was sent directly to the GY and was never properly Summoned.
●The last effect targets the “Red Dragon Archfiend” in the GY.
